Member Function Documentation

PictureBoxImage Core::ImageZoom::ZoomImage ( PictureBoxImage  pictureBoxImage,
float  zoom 
) [inline]

Zooms the image in the Shopped GUI to the specified zoom level.

Parameters:
zoom The amount of zoom to use on the image (1.0f == 100%).
pictureBoxImage The PictureBoxImage object in the current context of Shopped GUI
Returns:
A PictureBoxImage object with the appropriate properties set by this method.
